data: p=11+e−(α+β⁢X)𝑝11superscript𝑒𝛼𝛽𝑋p\,\,=\,\,\frac{1}{1+e^{-\left(\alpha+\beta X\right)}}italic_p = divide start_ARG 1 end_ARG start_ARG 1 + italic_e start_POSTSUPERSCRIPT - ( italic_α + italic_β italic_X ) end_POSTSUPERSCRIPT end_ARG

p𝑝pitalic_p: Probabilité que y=1𝑦1y=1italic_y = 1; α𝛼\alphaitalic_α: Terme d'interception de la fonction de régression; β𝛽\betaitalic_β: Vecteurs de coefficients de régression; X𝑋Xitalic_X: Vecteurs colonnes de variables explicatives.

𝒵=1.2⁢X1+1.4⁢X2+3.3⁢X3𝒵1.2subscript𝑋11.4subscript𝑋23.3subscript𝑋3\mathcal{Z}=1.2X_{1}+1.4X_{2}+3.3X_{3}caligraphic_Z = 1.2 italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 1.4 italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 3.3 italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT +0.6⁢X4+0.99⁢X50.6subscript𝑋40.99subscript𝑋5+0.6X_{4}+0.99X_{5}+ 0.6 italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 4 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + 0.99 italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 5 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT

X1subscript𝑋1X_{1}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 1 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Ratio de capital de trésorerie/actifs totaux; X2subscript𝑋2X_{2}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 2 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Ratio de bénéfices non distribués/actifs totaux; X3subscript𝑋3X_{3}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 3 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Ratio de bénéfices avant intérêts et impôts/actifs totaux; X4subscript𝑋4X_{4}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 4 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Ratio de la valeur boursière de l'équité/engagements totaux; X5subscript𝑋5X_{5}italic_X start_POSTSUBSCRIPT 5 end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Ratio de ventes totales/actifs totaux.

E⁢(ri)=rf+βi,M⁢K⁢T⁢(rm−rf)𝐸subscript𝑟𝑖subscript𝑟𝑓subscript𝛽𝑖𝑀𝐾𝑇subscript𝑟𝑚subscript𝑟𝑓E\left(r_{i}\right)=r_{f}+\beta_{i,MKT}\left(r_{m}-r_{f}\right)italic_E ( italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) = italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f end_POSTSUBSCRIPT + italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_M italic_K italic_T end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT - italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ) +βi,S⁢M⁢B⁢(S⁢M⁢B)+βi,H⁢M⁢L⁢(H⁢M⁢L)subscript𝛽𝑖𝑆𝑀𝐵𝑆𝑀𝐵subscript𝛽𝑖𝐻𝑀𝐿𝐻𝑀𝐿+\beta_{i,SMB}\left(SMB\right)+\beta_{i,HML}\left(HML\right)+ italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_S italic_M italic_B end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_S italic_M italic_B ) + italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i , italic_H italic_M italic_L end_POSTSUBSCRIPT ( italic_H italic_M italic_L )

risubscript𝑟𝑖r_{i}italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Rendement d'un actif ou d'un portefeuille i𝑖iitalic_i; rfsubscript𝑟𝑓r_{f}italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_f end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Taux sans risque; rmsubscript𝑟𝑚r_{m}italic_r start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_m end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Rendement du marché; βisubscript𝛽𝑖\beta_{i}italic_β start_POSTSUBSCRIPT italic_i end_POSTSUBSCRIPT: Exposition au facteur; S⁢M⁢B𝑆𝑀𝐵SMBitalic_S italic_M italic_B: Rendement du portefeuille simulé pour le facteur de taille à l'instant t𝑡titalic_t (petit moins grand); H⁢M⁢L𝐻𝑀𝐿HMLitalic_H italic_M italic_L: Rendement du portefeuille simulé pour le facteur de ratio livre-marché à l'instant t𝑡titalic_t (haut moins bas).
